Netflix Subtitle Translator is a Chrome extension designed for language learners and anyone who wants to enjoy Netflix content with translated subtitles. By providing real-time subtitle translations, this extension enhances your viewing experience and helps you understand foreign languages better.

Why install it?

Language Learning: Ideal for language learners who want to watch shows in a foreign language with dual subtitles, allowing you to compare the original and translated text simultaneously.

Overcome Limitations: Bypass Netflix's limitations by getting translations in languages that are not offered by Netflix.

Customization: Adjust the font size, textbox width, and placement of the translated subtitles on your screen for a personalized viewing experience.

User-Friendly: Easily toggle the visibility of original captions and reset all settings with a single click.

Functionalities:
Drag the translated text box to any location on the screen.
Adjust font size and textbox width using sliders in the extension's popup.

Toggle the visibility of the original captions with the "Hide Original Captions" button.

Reset all settings to default with the "Reset" button.
Installation and Usage:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Go to Netflix.com and start playing a video.

Right-click on the screen, select "Translate," and choose your target language.

The translated subtitles will appear in your chosen language.
By installing Netflix Subtitle Translator, you gain an effective tool for language learning and an enhanced viewing experience on Netflix.
